ROOT:
-- DaoSHIPPERS_D5_SelCnt -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "SHIPPERS"
WHERE AND "SHIPPERID" = :SHIPPERIDAND "SHIPPERID" IS NULL AND "SHIPPERID" LIKE :SHIPPERID_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "COMPANYNAME" = :COMPANYNAMEAND "COMPANYNAME" IS NULL AND "COMPANYNAME" LIKE :COMPANYNAME_Like ESCAPE '\' AND "PHONE" = :PHONEAND "PHONE" IS NULL AND "PHONE" LIKE :PHONE_Like ESCAPE '\'
